2089640.description:
Lost Color

Developed by indie game development team Aleph Studio, Lost Color is a 2D flatformer action adventure metropolitana genre game that tells the story of a Synus continent that has lost its color under absolute king rule.

Stepping into the world of Lost Color, the player opens his eyes on the Synus continent with no memory and goes on a journey to regain his or her memory, encountering various characters, hearing their voices suffering from repression of freedom, fighting against the king with unique and unique monsters, and writing a moving adventure to reclaim lost colors for all.

Game Features

  • The free movement of the protagonist, such as movement, jumping, rolling, rushing, and grappling, shows the experience beyond the manipulation you want.
  • The protagonist's beliefs that change depending on your choice will affect his skills, appearance, and story in the future. Find your own beliefs!
  • Explore more than 10 unique villages or regions of the Sinus and become a wonderful explorer of the Synus!
  • There are more than 35 different monsters and about 15 bosses waiting for your battle on the Synus continent.
  • The delicate narratives and conversations of more than 50 NPCs provide a rich game story and immersion.
  • You can mount a wide range of weapons, from melee to long range weapons, replace them in real time, and create your own style of combat!
  • Survive in a combination of more than 15 different mounting items.
